data.title: Why Dombivli Is The Best Place To Invest In Property?
data.meta_description: Discover why you make your new Home in Dombivli, one of India’s fastest-growing residential and commercial hubs, and a prized vicinity close to Mumbai. data.text:

What if we said there’s a place where schools and colleges, markets, malls, consuming out, shopping, entertainment, locations of worship, doctors and hospitals, green spaces, banks and ATMs, railway station and bus stands, multi-mode transport, and a growing urban middle-class community of literates and authorities is a 15-min. walk or 5 min. power in the vicinity? Welcome to Dombivli.

What’s already in place and what’s coming in the near and not-so-distant future make Dombivli a sought-after location to move in. No depend you’re newly married, nuclear family, joint family, migrant professional or retired seniors, no longer many cities in the MMR evaluate with Dombivli East. Read on to find out why.

For decades, the humans of Dombivli have relied on Mumbai’s Central suburban train network for their daily commute. At 1.5-2 kms, Dombivli station is without difficulty reachable from nearly all developed and upcoming townships in the East. Thane and Navi Mumbai too are without problems handy via avenue and served by using general NMMT and State Transport buses. In addition, Kalyan-Dombivli Municipal Transport (KDMT) serves a wide variety of routes between Kalyan, Dombivli, Navi Mumbai, Titwala, Bhiwandi, Thane, Badlapur and Panvel.

With a wide variety of business and corporate hubs emerging in Navi Mumbai, Panvel and Thane, an increasing variety of residents from Dombivli East go back and forth by road to these hubs. Dombivli is related by country highways to Panvel and Kalyan, and arterial roads to Navi Mumbai and Mumbai.

A number of proposed and already underway infrastructure initiatives connecting Dombivli to MMR are anticipated to increase connectivity with the aid of lowering tour times and offering more than one tour modes. In addition, there is the direct benefit of accelerated jobs and commercialisation resulting in GDP increase in the present day decade and beyond.

The upcoming Kalyan-Dombivli-Taloja Metro Line 12 is predicted to ease tour to Navi Mumbai, up to the industrial belt of Taloja. This line is expected to further join to Metro Line 5, Thane-Bhiwandi-Kalyan, at one stop and the Navi Mumbai Airport Metro Line at the other.

Several big ticket projects are in the works, one of which is the Mumbra-Panvel highway, which includes two six-lane flyovers at Kalyan Phata and Shilphata junction, and an underpass at Kalyan Phata for crossover of automobiles between Kalyan-Nashik. The Dombivli stretch of the task is expected to ease congestion and ensure a devoted corridor for the visitors moving between Thane and Panvel, Kalyan and Navi Mumbai.

Situated away from the hustle and bustle and noise of metropolis life, the solely sound that you hear in River Wood Park in Thane is the gurgling water of the river. An epitome of elegance, the society is built with perfect attention to details from each aspect. The assignment is built through the Siddharth Group that was headquartered in 1990 and has been supplying townships, resorts, 2d homes, industrial complexes and housing for all earnings levels. Indoors or outdoors, something your preference is, the River Wood Park is loaded with an extensive vary of amenities for a lavish lifestyle.

You can discover RiverWood Park reviews, River Wood Park address, River Wood Park photos, flooring plan, specifications, locational benefits and a lot more. Known for its strong connectivity, the society is situated in Dombivli East, Thane and provides effortless accessibility to Lodha Casa Rio Bus Stand, Palava City Bus Stop, Padle Gaon, Datiwali and Nilaje train stations, Kalyan Alstrip Ulhasnagar Airport, Lodha Casa Rio Bus Stand, Palava City Bus Stop, Lodha World School, Chandresh Lodha Memorial School, Sunflower Primary School, Little Hopes Pre School, Pawar Public School, Sarkari Hospital, Metro Hospital, Mukesh Medical, Dandekar Hospital, PVR Cinemas, Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport and a lot more.
